about_the_game:
The soundtrack for The Sealed Ampoule with total 22 tracks.

01-Darkness (Opening)
02-Rolling Out
03-Cabinet of Curiosities
04-Clandestine Manipulation
05-Break for the Wise
06-World of Birth and Death
07-Show of Deception
08-Pressurized Vessel
09-Cleaning House
10-A Moment in Glass
11-Time for Production!
12-Amazing Development
13-A Mystery Revealed
14-O.G. (Original Guard)
15-Strike It Rich
16-A Stern Warning
17-Entrance to Completion
18-The Sealed Song
19-Let's Get Absurd
20-Rainbow Warfare
21-Temptation
22-Hikaria (Ending)
